achievements.title: Mixed Feelings
achievements.desc: 98% hatred, 2% love. Give it some time and these two will reverse.

achievements.title: Love Me or Die
achievements.desc: Yandere is a form of love too. A rather extreme one, but still!

achievements.title: Breaking the Chains
achievements.desc: With love, nothing is impossible. You just have to let someone break you free of restrictions.

achievements.title: Heart That Never Stops Beating
achievements.desc: When I see you, my kokoro goes doki-doki and the sekai starts to spin around. How could I live without you?
